title: Report button in lobby plz
body: Please add a report button in the pre game lobby. I dodge whenever i feel there is a knob in my team due to the fact i just cant stand playing witht hem, whetever it be having 3 junglers or 4 people mid, i dont know why people should have waste a minimum of 20 mins of their time to simply report someone(or more than one person) at the end of game screen.

replies.body:
I feel like this could just encourage people to report people who don't let them have a certain role, rather than encourage teamwork.
It'd be like "Mid or I report you right now."
